artist: Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Folded sheet from fashion periodical (P.15,633); woman at left holds a green and orange fan and wears a white gown with scroll-like design in red, blue, and yellow with two naked figures on bottom third of skirt, and a hat with green plumes and five red tulips; woman at right in white gown with shafts of wheat dotted with red flowers on bottom third of skirt, a red, white, and blue sash, and a dotted hat with a red, white, and blue bow and purple flowers
portfolio: From Journal de la Mode et du Goût, ou amusemens du salon et de la toilette, Paris, 1790–92
title: Fashion plate from Journal de la Mode et du Goût, Seconde Année, Dix-septième Cahier, 5 Août 1791
